title: FS: 45 SGC T206 (HOF, SL, Black Sox)
author: t206hound

posts.post_title: FS: 45 SGC T206 (HOF, SL, Black Sox)
posts.post_content:
Selling off a fair number of my lower grade cards to make room for some upgrades.  All are either SGC 10 or 20.  Prices are firm, payment by paypal gift/money owed.   For shipping, include $3 for lots up to $50, $5 for lots up to $100 and an extra $1 for every additional hundred.

[URL="http://gallery.me.com/kimsummers#100037"]The link to front scans of all cards[/URL].  If you would like a back scan, let me know.  Any items of note from the back (paper loss, stains, etc.) are noted.  I've bolded the HOF, SL, minor stars and other cards of note:

AVAILABLE
Shad Barry [PB] - SGC 10: $14
George Browne (Chicago) [P150] - SGC 10: $20
